definition: a craze/a popular wave/a hit with the public
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to clasp/to cup the hands/to hold up with both hands/to offer (esp. in cupped hands)/to praise/to flatter

sentences.english: Suddenly the China hype hipsters had competition.
sentences.chinese: 熱捧中國的人突然碰到了對手。
